text.value: Overcome the law of the sandwich! Catch the sandwiches with the filling to the top!

Catch falling sandwiches with the filling up, this is important! Don't catch other items. Game continues until 10 losses.
loss counts if: 1. The sandwich falls to the floor. 2. You catch a burger with the filling down. 3. Catching a foreign object.
Survive as long as possible, catch the most sandwiches! Controls: move the plate by dragging on the screen.
It is not necessary to click on the grater itself.
To start the game, click on the sandwich in the main menu.
